mapper.insert: insert into tbl_faq (faq_title, faq_content, member_id) value (#{faqTitle}, #{faqContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select m.member_nickname, f.id, f.faq_title, f.faq_content, f.faq_status, f.member_id, f.created_date from tbl_member m join tbl_faq f on m.id = f.member_id where m.member_type = '관리자' and faq_status = '정상' order by f.id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount}
select count(*) from tbl_faq where faq_status = '정상'
mapper.update: update tbl_faq set faq_title = #{faqTitle}, faq_content = #{faqContent} where id = #{id}
update tbl_faq set faq_status = '삭제' where id = #{id}
